trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when a component cannot be granted a license.
trans-unit.target: 表示無法對元件授與授權時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method throws LicenseException when a component cannot obtain a valid license.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法在元件無法取得有效授權時，會擲回 LicenseException。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when a component is either not licensed, or is licensed but cannot be granted a valid license.
trans-unit.target: 會發生這種情況是當元件未經授權，或已授權，但不能授與有效的授權。

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關授權的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 授權元件和控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type of component that was denied a license.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref>拒絕授權的元件類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表未獲得授權的元件類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref>類別指定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>来用於還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於還原序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref>類別的類型和已拒絕授權元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表未獲得授權的元件類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: 未授與的授權元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license, along with a message to display.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref>類別的類型和已拒絕的授權，以及要顯示的訊息元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表未獲得授權的元件類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: 未授與的授權元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> class for the type and the instance of the component that was denied a license, along with a message to display and the original exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref>類別的類型和已拒絕的授權，以及要顯示的訊息和擲回原始例外狀況的元件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表未獲得授權的元件類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: 未授與的授權元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception message to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the original exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>表示原始的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>例外狀況的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>来用於還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於還原序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: 取得未獲得授權的元件類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component that was not granted a license.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表未獲得授權的元件類型。</xref:System.Type>
